text: ryy anak del ban bangkeut mekh cheachraen chean ning phendei ning ban banhchouh tukaphlieng pi leumekh aoy puok anak brasaer cheang? haeydaoy sar tukaphlieng noh yeung ban bandoh chenh chea suonutyean cheachraen del mean pheap srasabamprong del puok anak kmean samotthaphap nung bandoh daem chheu teangnoh ban laey . tae mean mcheasa phe sa ng del trauv korp sakkar ruom cheamuoy a l laoh ryy? phtoytowvinh puokke kuchea krom del ngeak chenhpi karpit
